DOC.brief_summary: Optically-based data will be compared to tonometry to determine correlation of pulse wave velocity measurement.
DOC.criteria: Between the ages of1825 and 6590 will be studied. Normotensive and hypertensive subjects Willing to provide informed consent has finger deformities or amputations that will prohibit proper sensor placement pregnant or actively trying to get pregnant Cardiogreen or other intravascular/tissue dyes less than 5 hours prior to the study.
